name: PANG PONG
description:
THE WINNER IS THE PLAYER WHO SCORES 6 POINT FIRST

W & Sleft playerUP ARROW & DOWN ARROWright player

Pang Pong is a classic 2 player arcade game that brings back the nostalgia of the popular Pong game. The objective of the game is simple - use your paddle to hit the ball back and forth between the two players and score points. With its colorful retro graphics and fast-paced gameplay, Pang Pong is the perfect game for all ages.

play offline by downlowding the windows version
